DOC.brief_summary: This PMS aim assess efficacy , safety tolerability profile Faslodex everyday practice . Secondary objective PMS identify frequency serious adverse event unknown adverse event Faslodex .
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal woman Patients fail 2 prior hormone therapy ( The prior hormone therapy contain antiestrogen nonsteroidal Aromatase inhibitor ) Patients intolerant prior hormone therapy endocrine therapeutic option ( The prior hormone therapy contain antiestrogen nonsteroidal Aromatase inhibitor ) The patient receive Faslodex treatment
